Name:
Spikenard
Spikenard
Builder: George T. Davie & Sons Ltd., Lauzon
Identification:
Pennant number: K198
Pennant number: K198
Fate:
loaned to Canada 1941; sunk 1942
sunk 10 February 1942
processing systems:
Radar - SW1C or 2C (later)
Sonar - Type 123A, later Type 127DV
Armament:
1 × BL 4 in (102 mm) Mk.IX single gun
2 .50 cal machine gun twin
2 Lewis .303 cal mg twin
2 Mk.II depth charge throwers
2 Depth charge rails with 40 depth charges.
Originally fitted with minesweeping gear, later removed.
